Privacy Policy

Daily Tour and Travel understands and values the privacy of customers. We are committed to protecting the personal information of our customers and this privacy policy is written for you to understand how we handle your data and ensure your privacy when using our services. By using our website, you agree to our privacy policy and consent to the terms and conditions of using this website.

Information We Collect

When you use our website or fill in the details, we may collect the following information:

  • Name
  • Date of Birth
  • Address
  • Legal Identification
  • Phone Number
  • Debit/Credit Card Details

Don’t worry, the information that we collect is used for fair purposes only and it will remain confidential. It will only be used strictly to fulfill your travel needs.

How We Use Your Information

Daily Tour and Travel only uses customer information to conduct our business operations including:

  • Confirming bookings and reservations
  • Sending travel-related information and updates
  • Providing customer support
  • Processing payments
  • Other travel-related communication

We do not share your data with third parties unless it is necessary to fulfill your travel arrangements.

Information Sharing

Daily Tour and Travel may share customer information with:

  • Trusted subsidiaries and business associates
  • Service providers necessary for your travel arrangements
  • Government authorities when required by law

This sharing is essential for the smooth processing of bookings, accommodations, and other arrangements related to your safari, tour, and stay experience.

Data Collection & Site Usage

To enhance the user experience of our website and services, we collect the general patterns of site usage. This helps us understand how people use our site and improve our services. Please note that these insights are based on general trends and do not include personally identifiable information.

Security Measures and Limitations

We take all reasonable precautions to ensure the safety and privacy of your personal information. However, Daily Tour and Travel cannot be held responsible for any unauthorised access or misuse of your information due to internet vulnerabilities.

Other Related Information

  • Telephonic conversations with our team may be recorded to maintain and improve service quality.
  • We use cookies to personalize your browsing experience. These small files stored on your browser make your visit more convenient without compromising your security or privacy.
  • We reserve the right to update this policy at any time without notice. Please review this policy regularly for updates.

Note: If you have any questions or concerns regarding your privacy, please contact us at privacy@dailytourtravel.com.

This is not an official website of "Ranthambhore National Park". This is a Registered under the Private Travel Agency name Daily Tour and Travel. We organize Hotel, Safari and Tour Package bookings in Ranthambhore National Park.
